results.title: Differential Effects of Prevention and Reversal Treatment with Lisinopril on Left Ventricular Remodelling in a Rat Model of Heart Failure.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, represent the front line pharmacological treatment for @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, which is characterised by marked @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@left ventricular (LV) dilatation@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Brower GL, Levick SP, Janicki JS. Differential Effects of Prevention and Reversal Treatment with Lisinopril on Left Ventricular Remodelling in a Rat Model of Heart Failure. Heart Lung Circ. 2015 Sep;24(9):919-24. PMID: 25837018

results.title: The prognostic value of predischarge quantitative two-dimensional echocardiographic measurements and the effects of early lisinopril treatment on left ventricular structure and function after acute myocardial infarction in the GISSI-3 Trial. Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'Infarto Miocardico.
results.text_hl: We assessed (1) the prognostic value of pre-discharge 2-D echocardiographic variables, and (2) the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@left ventricular dilatation@@@.

citations.NLM: Nicolosi GL, Latini R, Marino P, Maggioni AP, Barlera S, Franzosi MG, Geraci E, Santoro L, Tavazzi L, Tognoni G, Vecchio C, Volpi A. The prognostic value of predischarge quantitative two-dimensional echocardiographic measurements and the effects of early lisinopril treatment on left ventricular structure and function after acute myocardial infarction in the GISSI-3 Trial. Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'Infarto Miocardico. Eur Heart J. 1996 Nov;17(11):1646-56. PMID: 8922912

results.title: Inhibition of matrix metalloproteinase activity by ACE inhibitors prevents left ventricular remodeling in a rat model of heart failure.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: Long-term in vivo administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ also prevented @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@LV dilatation@@@, attenuated @DISEASE_Hypertrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@myocardial hypertrophy@@@, and prevented changes in myocardial compliance and contractility.

citations.NLM: Brower GL, Levick SP, Janicki JS. Inhibition of matrix metalloproteinase activity by ACE inhibitors prevents left ventricular remodeling in a rat model of heart failure. Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol. 2007 Jun;292(6):H3057-64. PMID: 17308006

results.title: Reversible cardiac dysfunction in long-standing hypertension may be global variant of stress cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: He responded well to diuretics and gradual uptitration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@.
